featured.title: Hiring - Engagement Director
featured.summary:
We have begun the search for an Engagement Director.

This is a flexible part-time (hourly) position that will work directly with the priest in areas of outreach, youth and young adult ministry, and evangelization. Please see the attached posting for more information.
